Name: Chadboy
About the game: Chadboy is a roguelite beat'em up game about a martial arts master who goes against the system and decides to destroy the office of the most influential criminal authority in the city. To accomplish this, you'll have to navigate through multiple floors filled with bribed office workers and security guards. Use everything at your disposal - your fists, feet, and makeshift weapons - to defeat the villains and rid the city of their influence once and for all. In Chadboy, the gameplay is designed to be challenging and replayable, with procedurally generated floors and a permadeath system that forces players to start from the beginning if they die. The combat system is fast-paced and rewarding, with a variety of moves and combos to master. As you progress through the floors, you'll encounter tougher enemies and powerful bosses who will put your skills to the test. Features: Roguelite beat'em up: Chadboy combines elements of the roguelite and beat'em up genres to create a unique gameplay experience that is different every time thanks to randomly generated levels. Combat system: The game offers a fast and dynamic combat system in which you can use a variety of attacks and combos to defeat your enemies. Permadeath: Chadboy has a permadeath system, which means that if the main character dies, you will have to start the game again, but you can continually improve your skills and strategy.
